org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.http

Interface SelectableHistoryReferencesContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HttpMessageContainer, MessageContainer<HttpMessage>, MultipleHistoryReferencesContainer, MultipleHttpMessagesContainer, MultipleMessagesContainer<HttpMessage>, SelectableHttpMessagesContainer, SelectableMessagesContainer<HttpMessage>, SingleHistoryReferenceContainer, SingleHttpMessageContainer, SingleMessageContainer<HttpMessage>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSelectableHistoryReferencesContainer

    public interface SelectableHistoryReferencesContainer
extends SelectableHttpMessagesContainer, MultipleHistoryReferencesContainer
    A SelectableHttpMessagesContainer that exposes the HistoryReferences of the container.
    Since:
    2.3.0
    See Also:
    HistoryReference, SelectableHttpMessagesContainer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HistoryReference getSelectedHistoryReference()
      Returns the HistoryReference associated with the selected message or null if none.
      List<HistoryReference> getSelectedHistoryReferences()
      Returns all the HistoryReferences associated with the selected messages.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.SelectableMessagesContainer

        getNumberOfSelectedMessages, getSelectedMessage, getSelectedMessages, hasSelectedMessages, isOnlyOneMessageSelected

      • Methods inherited from interface org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.http.MultipleHistoryReferencesContainer

        getHistoryReference, getHistoryReferences

      • Methods inherited from interface org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.MultipleMessagesContainer

        getMessage, getMessages, getNumberOfMessages

      • Methods inherited from interface org.zaproxy.zap.view.messagecontainer.MessageContainer

        getComponent, getName, isEmpty

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectedHistoryReference

        HistoryReference getSelectedHistoryReference()
        Returns the HistoryReference associated with the selected message or null if none.

        If multiple messages are selected the HistoryReference of the first one is returned.

        Returns:
        the selected message or null if none.

      • getSelectedHistoryReferences

        List<HistoryReference> getSelectedHistoryReferences()
        Returns all the HistoryReferences associated with the selected messages.

        No assumptions should be made on the actual implementation type of the List returned by this method.

        Returns:
        a List with all the HistoryReferences associated with the selected messages, never null.
        See Also:
        SelectableMessagesContainer.getNumberOfSelectedMessages()
